name: Planet Trade Organization
startIntroPart1: Lord Frieza, we have encountered this planet full of life. command us to victory, our galactic emperor...
declaringWar: Shall we begin this spectacle of horror?
attacked: It’s Been So Long Since I Felt Pain. It’s Such A Strange Sensation.
introduction: I Doubt I Need An Introduction, But Just In Case, I Am The Mighty Frieza... And Yes, All The Horrible Stories You’ve Heard Are True.
afterPeace: i'm more merciful than I appear.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
